name: wwf-banner-core-assets
description: Central image and (S)CSS asset package for wwf-banner-core

scripts.assemble: shx mkdir -p dist && shx mkdir -p dist/images && shx mkdir -p dist/sample-images && npm run styles && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: shx cp -fr images/* dist/images && shx cp -fr sample-images/* dist/sample-images
